roleset.name: indulge to excess
roleset.note: LUXURIATE-V NOTES: Roleset by Katie based on internet search, parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class marvel-31.3-5. (from luxuriate.01-v)

example.name: Enjoyer example
example.text: She luxuriated in the taste of the ice cream.
example.arg: in the taste of the ice cream.

example.name: Big spender example
example.text: He luxuriated with the purchase of a Mercedes Benz CLK 320.
example.arg: with the purchase of a Mercedes Benz CLK 320.

example.name: Non-human luxuriant
example.text: The plants luxuriated in the new soil.
